translation.en: And I don't understand how you can stand there

translation.en: and continue to keep secrets from me after everything we've been through.

I'm glad we came here
to realize that you belong in this city, Joseph.

translation.en: I don't.
All right. All right. Spit it out.
-The wine? -No! Not the wine!
translation.fr: - Le vin ? - Non ! Pas le vin !

and so we walked and talked all the way up here.

translation.en: My calves hurt, and I know that you got more on your mind.

translation.en: [smacks lips] You don't have to be afraid because I'm…
[mumbling] …falling in love with you.
-What? -What?
[smacks lips] I'm…
falling in love with you.
-Oh, wow, uh… -I'm sorry.
No. I just wasn't expecting--
-No, I get it. That's… that's fine. -That's why I was gonna…
translation.fr: - Je comprends. C'est bon. - C'est pour ça que…

translation.en: -Wow. Um… -Sorry.
I think I'm falling for you too.
I mean, I am.
I'm falling in love with you.
For real?
-[Brandy] Mm-hmm. -You are?
[chuckles] I am.
Okay, just…
Okay. You do so much for Callie
translation.fr: Bon, tu fais tellement de choses pour Callie.

translation.en: and her family
and this land. [exhales heavily]
I just… I wanna know what you want.

Well,
you got what you wanted.
What are you talking about?
[Joseph] You drove her away

tell me you're not blaming me for your lack of honesty.

translation.en: You know how much she means to me.

translation.en: I didn't do anything wrong.

translation.en: You only have yourself to blame.
[inhales] Besides,
seems like you both dodged a bit of a bullet.

translation.en: What?
[smacks lips] I should probably cancel the venue.
Picture's in your email.
-Do you wanna talk about it now or later? -Nope!
translation.fr: - Tu veux qu'on en parle maintenant ? - Non !

translation.en: You know, I was right.
I kept him on the farm all year long to avoid the inevitable.
translation.fr: Je le retenais pour éviter l'inévitable.

translation.en: And… and a recycled ring from an ex-fiancée I knew nothing about?

translation.en: -God! -Maybe there's more to this story.

translation.en: It doesn't matter. For him to even consider that I'd uproot my life

translation.en: and leave everything behind?
What is that face?
[smacks lips] Wasn't that what he did for you this past year?
translation.fr: C'est ce qu'il a fait pour toi cette année.

translation.en: No!
Yes! But it's not the same thing.
translation.fr: Si. Mais ce n'est pas pareil.

translation.en: [Brandy] Okay.
[smacks lips] Well, at least the farm is still standing, huh?
translation.fr: Au moins, la ferme est toujours là.

translation.en: We didn't burn it down.
How's Manny?
[high-pitched] He's good!
So good.
[Joseph] I know I royally messed up.
translation.fr: Je sais que j'ai tout gâché.

translation.en: -[Leo] Again. -[Joseph] Again.
But Owen and Callie?
It just doesn't seem right. It's… it's her dead fiancé's brother.
translation.fr: Ça ne colle pas. C'est le frère de son défunt fiancé.

translation.en: Like, what?
Things aren't always what they seem. Let the dust settle.
translation.fr: Les apparences peuvent tromper. Attendons de voir.

translation.en: Call her in a few days.
You've got the gala tomorrow night.
translation.fr: Concentrez-vous sur le gala. C'est demain soir.

translation.en: Focus on that. She'll come around before the wedding.
translation.fr: Concentrez-vous sur le gala. C'est demain soir. - Elle sera là au mariage. - Quel mariage ?

translation.en: What wedding?
translation.fr: - Elle sera là au mariage. - Quel mariage ?

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Excuse me.
I'll take that.
-Do you still have the paperwork? -Of course.
With Callie and I up in the air, my dad's legacy is all I have.
translation.fr: Sans Callie, il ne me reste que l'héritage de mon père.

translation.en: And I have a feeling that she's not coming back.
I think you're right.
From what she's posting on social media, she's on island.
translation.fr: D'après ses posts sur les réseaux sociaux, elle est

translation.en: Ugh.
What is wrong with you? I was talking about Callie!
translation.fr: Ça va pas ? Je parlais de Callie !

translation.en: But thank you. I can't unsee that.
translation.fr: Merci. Je ne pourrai pas l'oublier.

translation.en: What is it you really want?
I wanna marry Callie.
She wants to marry you too.
She just can't marry two of me.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas être deux.

translation.en: [Leo] Well, who's the real you?
[Callie exhales] Here we go.
Good luck.
-Han? -[Hannah] Not hungry.
Okay.
I saw the tree!
You guys did a great job. How'd you get so many lights to fit?
translation.fr: Il est super. Vous avez mis beaucoup de lumières.

translation.en: [Hannah] Manny helped because you weren't here.
translation.fr: Manny a aidé. Tu n'étais pas là.

translation.en: I got stitches.
I heard you were the best stitches patient that doctor had ever seen.
translation.fr: Le docteur a dit que tu avais été sa meilleure patiente.

translation.en: -I didn't cry. -I don't doubt it.
translation.fr: - J'ai pas pleuré. - J'en suis sûre.

translation.en: Where's Joseph?
Uh, he's… he's not back yet.
Oh boy.
Allow me, madame.
-[quietly] Thank you. -Mmm.
Hannah's not joining us?
Not until Joseph shows up.
-What? -[whispers] Tell her.
[whispers] Tell her what? You want me-- No. I'm not gonna tell her.
translation.fr: Dire quoi ? Non, je ne dirai rien.

translation.en: -Tell her. -I'm not gonna tell her tonight. It's--
translation.fr: Je ne lui dirai pas ce soir. Ce n'est pas…

translation.en: What is going on between you two?
[Manny] Okay. Last week, I saw her do something with her lips,
translation.fr: La semaine dernière, elle a fait un truc avec ses lèvres.

translation.en: and I knew… I knew at that moment that she wanted the goods!
translation.fr: J'ai su tout de suite de quoi elle avait envie !

translation.en: Okay. Hold-- Wait! Hold on. What? You guys are…
You guys…
When I was gone. Am I getting this right? [chuckles]
Wow. I mean, I'm so happy for you guys!
translation.fr: Je suis super contente pour vous.

translation.en: Thank you.
Jeez, what else happened when I was gone?
-No! Hmm? -What?
No way. This is delicious. Thank you!
translation.fr: Non, j'y crois pas. C'est délicieux. Merci !

translation.en: -[exhales] -So good. -It's so good. -Mm-hmm.
-And you're not gonna tell her? -I'm not. No.
translation.fr: - Tu ne vas pas lui dire ? - Non.

translation.en: -Can I tell her? -Mm-mm.
-[Brandy clears throat] -All right! Everything okay?
Okay.
Ten years ago,
when I moved to California, I had very few goals.
translation.fr: quand j'ai déménagé en Californie, j'avais peu d'objectifs.

translation.en: Um, I thought I'd find a place to stay for free
and make enough money to buy some video games… [chuckles]
translation.fr: et gagner assez d'argent pour acheter des jeux vidéo.

translation.en: …but what I hadn't realized until I started working here
translation.fr: Mais ce que j'ai compris en commençant à travailler ici,

translation.en: was I was searching for a family all along.
translation.fr: c'était que je cherchais une famille depuis le début.

translation.en: [choking up] I, uh… [clears throat] I've been on my own for a while now,
translation.fr: Je suis seul depuis un moment,

translation.en: and, uh, this is the first time in my life
translation.fr: et pour la première fois de ma vie,

translation.en: that I've ever felt like I belong somewhere.
translation.fr: je me sens à ma place quelque part.

translation.en: You, Hannah, this land.
You're my family.
And, uh,
I love you guys. I would do anything for you all.
translation.fr: Je vous aime. Je ferais tout pour vous.

translation.en: Okay, I have cried enough in the past 24 hours.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà assez pleuré en 24 heures.

translation.en: -If you don't stop-- -Okay. I… I'll…
I'll cut to the chase. Um…
I plan on building a family of my own one day.
translation.fr: Je compte fonder ma propre famille un jour.

translation.en: Give them the same joy and support and acceptance
translation.fr: Leur donner autant de joie, de soutien et de reconnaissance que toi.

translation.en: that you've given me, but I can't do that unless
translation.fr: Leur donner autant de joie, de soutien et de reconnaissance que toi. Mais je ne peux faire ça

translation.fr: que si j'ai une terre à moi.

translation.en: I've, um…
I've reworked some of the numbers here, and Manny can continue working here as is,
translation.fr: J'ai retouché certains chiffres. Manny peut continuer à travailler ici.

translation.en: but instead of being paid in full each month,
translation.fr: Mais chaque mois, sur la totalité de sa paye,

translation.en: 15% can go towards purchasing a 12-acre plot out of your 200.
translation.fr: 15 % peuvent servir à acheter un terrain de cinq hectares sur tes 80.

translation.en: In five years, he can have ownership of the land for a fair price.
translation.fr: Dans cinq ans, il pourra avoir le terrain à un prix raisonnable.

translation.en: And there's this tree that gives this bomb-ass midafternoon shade

translation.en: that I think would be really--
-Yes! -What?
translation.fr: - Ce serait vraiment super. - Oui ! Quoi ?

translation.en: I can't believe I didn't think of this sooner.
translation.fr: J'aurais dû y penser plus tôt.

translation.en: Really? You'll sell me some of your land?
Merry Christmas.
-Yay! -[Manny] Thank you. This is awesome!
[inhales deeply] Manny, is everything okay?
-Is Callie there? -She is!
Can I talk to her?
He wants to know… You know what? I actually think she's busy.

translation.en: But listen, there's a lot I gotta tell you, okay?

translation.en: I was thinking about my future, and I talked to Callie,

translation.en: and she'll let me buy some of the land. Isn't that great? I mean, it's perfect! There's this great spot…

translation.en: [mom] Oh, I'm sorry, baby.
I really should have paid to have it stored properly.
translation.fr: J'aurais dû payer pour qu'elle soit bien conservée.

translation.en: It's so beautiful.
-You're beautiful. -[scoffs]
Well, what do you think? I don't know!
translation.fr: - Alors, qu'en penses-tu ? - Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: -Go try it on! -Can I try it on?
-Yes! -Okay.
[mom] Oh my gosh!
Oh, honey, it's stunning.
-I really like it. -You do?
-Mm-hmm. -Okay.
I just… [exhales]
I hope for a marriage as good as you and Dad.
translation.fr: J'espère avoir un aussi bon mariage que le tien.

translation.en: Have I ever told you the story of the invisible backpack?
translation.fr: Je t'ai déjà raconté l'histoire du sac à dos invisible ?

translation.en: -[chuckles] No. -No.
Well, see, when we're born,
we all come with this invisible backpack,
translation.fr: on a tous un "sac à dos invisible"

translation.en: you know, to put your experiences and… and your memories in.
translation.fr: dans lequel on met nos expériences et nos souvenirs.

translation.en: You know, for some people, well, that backpack just weighs a few pounds.
translation.fr: Chez certains, ce sac à dos ne pèse que quelques kilos.

translation.en: Gosh, you hardly even notice it's there.
But for others, it can feel like the weight of the world

translation.en: just sits on their shoulders.
translation.fr: D'autres donnent l'impression d'avoir le poids du monde sur les épaules.

translation.en: And sometimes, you don't find out what's in your partner's backpack

translation.en: until you are well into a marriage.
That's okay.
We all have baggage, you know?
Parts of ourselves we'd rather keep hidden

translation.en: and tucked away even from those we love the most.
translation.fr: Garder à l'écart de ceux qu'on aime le plus.

translation.fr: avant que son contenu ne soit révélé.

translation.en: or else you'll have a very long and rocky road ahead of you.

translation.en: You have to carry each other's burdens.
translation.fr: Chacun doit porter le fardeau de l'autre.

translation.en: I… I know you do, baby, but
there may come a day when you see something in him that he was
translation.fr: Mais un jour, tu pourrais voir quelque chose en lui qu'il avait peur de te montrer.

translation.fr: qu'il avait peur de te montrer.

translation.en: But hey, you know his heart. Right?

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Forgiveness is a superpower!
-"Seventy times seven." -Yeah.
-[mom] I love you. -[Callie] I love you too.
-Hey! -I'm sorry.
Oh. No, hon, I'm sorry, okay?
I got so overwhelmed and busy. I should have checked in with you more.

translation.en: Are you and Joseph still getting married?
[smacks lips] Hey. You and me are a team. Okay?

translation.en: -Okay. -Do you forgive me?
-Yeah. -[chuckles] Let me see that cool scar!
Ouch. Did it hurt?
Keep your head up.
Love you, kid.
[Joseph] Hey.
Hey, man! Hi.
You have something you want to say to me?

translation.en: Don't sweat it. You know, Callie said you guys have been struggling a bit.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas. Callie m'a parlé de vos difficultés.

translation.en: Things happen.
Things happen?
Yeah, things happen in every relationship. That doesn't mean you can move in whenev--
translation.fr: C'est ça, les relations. Mais tu n'as pas à draguer…

translation.en: Move in on…
What are you talking about, man?
I'm talking about you and Callie. Who else would I be talking about?

translation.en: I… I'm talking about the soup kitchen.

translation.fr: Callie et moi, on est juste amis.

translation.en: She and my brother were high school sweethearts before he died.

translation.en: I… I would never go there with her.

translation.en: Yeah?
Then how do you explain this?
Someone must've taken that during the last performance.
Look, same costume. [chuckles]
Performance?
My Mother Mary walked out on me for a day, so Callie filled in for her.
translation.fr: Notre Vierge Marie nous a fait faux bond. Callie l'a remplacée.

translation.en: -She didn't… she didn't tell you? -[sighs]
No, no. I think she forgot to mention it. [exhales]
translation.fr: Non. Elle a oublié de m'en parler.

translation.en: -I owe her one. -Mm-hmm.
See, these kids spend all day on the bus just to come to watch the live show,
translation.fr: Ces gamins ont passé la journée en bus pour venir voir le spectacle et l'âne.

translation.en: see the donkey.
translation.fr: pour venir voir le spectacle et l'âne.

translation.en: You know what? Uh,
don't pack up too much.
I think we can make budget cuts somewhere else.
Thank you. Thank you, man. S… S… stick around for the show!
translation.fr: Merci, mec. Reste pour le spectacle !

translation.en: Mom?
Listen. I'm gonna cut to the chase because the service here is awful!
translation.fr: Je vais aller droit au but. Ça capte très mal ici.

translation.fr: Victoria m'a dit que le mariage était annulé.

translation.en: Look, I… I thought we could do it all.
But you should have seen her.
I mean, she was single-handedly closing suppliers we never would've locked in.

translation.en: That doesn't surprise me.
And I completely ruined it.
Neither does that.
How could you leave me with this decision?
Because I knew you'd make the right one!
translation.fr: Parce que tu prendras la bonne.

Before your father started the business, it was an idea
translation.fr: Au début, la société n'était qu'une idée

translation.en: in our one-bedroom apartment.
Even though the money came along, it was never about that.
translation.fr: L'argent a suivi, mais il ne s'agissait pas de ça.

translation.en: If your father were here,

translation.fr: il te dirait qu'il n'a jamais travaillé.

translation.en: When your father died, I… I got lost in it all. I…

translation.en: The city, the money.
You and Callie showed me what it was like to follow my heart.
translation.fr: Grâce à toi et Callie, j'ai appris à écouter mon cœur.

translation.en: It led me here!
I'll never be able to thank you enough.
translation.fr: Je ne te remercierai jamais assez.

translation.en: So, where does that leave me?
Make it right, Joseph.
You did it once. You can do it again.
translation.fr: Tu l'as déjà fait. Tu peux le refaire.

translation.en: Hi, Mom.
God, I miss you.
This isn't easy.
"Seventy times seven"?
Seems like one too many mistakes.
But you were right.
I know his heart.
I love him.
I would forgive him 1,000 more times if I had to.
translation.fr: Je lui pardonnerais mille fois s'il le fallait.

translation.en: Am I crazy? [chuckles]
I wish you could be here.
The God of the universe came to us in the form of a tiny, lowly baby.
translation.fr: Le Dieu de l'univers est venu à nous sous la forme d'un petit bébé.

translation.en: Not with red carpets, limousines,
paparazzi, and press releases,
translation.fr: sans paparazzis, sans communiqués de presse.

translation.en: but silently,
in the quiet of the night.
translation.fr: dans le silence de la nuit.

translation.en: This time of year, we…
we tend to look out at the hustle and bustle of the world's busy lives,
translation.fr: on a tendance à regarder l'agitation des vies trépidantes du monde.

translation.en: and for once, we become more interested in people than in things.
translation.fr: Et pour une fois, on s'intéresse plus aux gens qu'aux choses.

translation.en: The best things in life
translation.fr: Les meilleurs aspects de la vie

translation.en: aren't things at all.
So, let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts.
translation.fr: Gardons l'esprit de Noël dans nos cœurs.

this is as good as it gets without Victoria's fancy wardrobe.
translation.fr: On ne fera pas mieux sans la garde-robe chic de Victoria.

translation.en: Hey, you're perfect!
Who needs designer brands when you got a body like that?
translation.fr: Pas besoin de marques de luxe avec un corps pareil.

Let's.
[inhales] Thank you.

-I can, and I already did. -But this is suicide!
translation.fr: - C'est déjà fait. - Mais c'est du suicide !

translation.fr: Je vais dire quoi ? Les invités arrivent dans 20 minutes.

translation.en: I don't know. Uh, have them stay at one of our hotels for the weekend.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Ils peuvent passer le week-end à l'hôtel.

translation.en: Or better yet, have them turn their private jets around so they can go home for the holidays.
translation.fr: Ou ils peuvent reprendre leur jet privé et rentrer chez eux.

translation.en: [Harry] Too late.
[gasps] Harry.
Gentlemen,
believe me, I will take care of everything.
Joseph doesn't realize the importance of this evening.
translation.fr: Joseph ne comprend pas l'importance du gala.

translation.en: [Joseph] Merry Christmas, Harry.
How's the wife, kids?

translation.en: They're fine.
How old is your youngest?
translation.fr: Quel âge a le plus jeune ?

translation.en: Is he… He was nine? Ten?
translation.fr: Il a neuf ans ? Dix ans ?

translation.en: Eight.
Uh, where are you going with this, Joseph? We have no time.
I saw a kid today.
He didn't have shoes on, and he was about your son's age.
translation.fr: Sans chaussures, l'âge de votre fils.

translation.en: Yeah, he took four buses to get a hot cup of soup.
translation.fr: Il a pris quatre bus pour avoir une soupe chaude.

translation.en: Barefoot.
Now, in here we are about to assemble millions of dollars,
translation.fr: Ici, on s'apprête à réunir des millions de dollars.

translation.en: and honestly, for what?
When my dad offered you the CFO position,
translation.fr: Quand mon père vous a proposé ce poste,

translation.en: why'd you take the job?
My family. The kids.
Yet here you are, away from your family,
translation.fr: Mais vous êtes ici. Loin de votre famille, à quelques jours de Noël.

translation.en: just days before Christmas,
translation.fr: Loin de votre famille, à quelques jours de Noël.

translation.en: and you're focused on work.
The Bernet Farms taught me that simple can be better.
translation.fr: À la ferme des Bernet, j'ai appris la simplicité.

translation.en: That having less can sometimes mean having more.
translation.fr: Qu'avoir moins pouvait parfois signifier avoir plus.

translation.fr: Je vais occuper le poste de président par intérim de la société.

translation.en: There will be a shift in the company,
from caring solely about the shareholders to also caring about the community.
translation.fr: Le bien de la communauté s'ajoutera à celui des actionnaires.

translation.en: And you might not like to hear this, but 10% of our annual profits
translation.fr: Ça ne vous plaira pas, mais 10 % de nos bénéfices

translation.en: will go to multiple charities around the city.
translation.fr: seront versés à divers organismes caritatifs.

translation.en: What profits?
I consider all of you family. I do.
translation.fr: Je vous considère comme ma famille.

translation.en: And I hope this doesn't change our working relationship.
translation.fr: J'espère que notre relation restera la même.

translation.en: But if it does…
maybe that's okay.
Oh, and if you're hungry, I hear the soup kitchen next door
translation.fr: Si vous avez faim, la soupe populaire à côté

translation.en: has quite the spread.
-[sighs heavily] -[Callie] I could eat.
[Callie] That was quite the speech back there.
I meant every word.
And I know an apology can't change the fact that I kept something from you for so long.
translation.fr: Je ne t'ai pas tout dit. Des excuses n'y changeront rien.

translation.en: I forgive you.
That's it? [Callie exhales] That's it.
That speech back there?
translation.fr: Le discours que tu as fait ?

translation.en: That is the Joseph I've known for the last year,
translation.fr: C'est le Joseph que je connais depuis un an.

translation.en: and that is the Joseph that I would like to marry.
translation.fr: Et c'est le Joseph que je voudrais épouser.

translation.en: -You still wanna marry me? -[both chuckle]
'Cause I… I'll do anything.
I will. I… I don't need the city. I know that now. I just--
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Pas besoin de la ville…

translation.en: I'm not gonna make you give up your life here.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à y renoncer.

translation.en: We'll figure something out.
And besides, you've got a lot of work to do.
translation.fr: Et tu as beaucoup de travail.

translation.en: Multiple charities?
You can't do that all from Petaluma, can you?
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas gérer tout ça depuis Petaluma.

translation.en: -And about the wedding-- -Yeah, about that. We lost the venue.
translation.fr: - Et pour le mariage… - Oui. Plus de salle.

translation.en: I have another idea.
Uh, Victoria, can I talk to you for a second?
[Joseph] You know I think fondly of our years together.
You are hardworking and ambitious.
You're exactly the kind of person that people expected
translation.fr: Tu es le genre de femme que les gens pensaient

translation.en: Joseph Van Aston to marry.
I know it's… it's long overdue, but…
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est trop tard,

translation.en: I'm really sorry,
and I hope you'll forgive me.
What was your excuse again?
"Marriage just isn't for me, V."
[inhales] I always thought I'd be the one who tamed the lion.
translation.fr: Je pensais arriver à te dompter.

translation.en: Watching Callie parade around with that rock on her finger was just--
translation.fr: Voir Callie s'exhiber avec cette bague au doigt, c'était…

translation.en: Oh, the rock that you said once was on your finger?
translation.fr: Celle que tu disais avoir portée ?

translation.en: -Joseph-- -[Joseph] I'm not trying to fight.
translation.fr: - Joseph. - Je ne cherche pas la dispute.

translation.en: If I remember right, you kept the ring that I gave you.
translation.fr: Mais il me semble que tu as gardé la bague que je t'ai donnée.

translation.en: Turned it into a beautiful pair of half diamond studs.
translation.fr: J'en ai fait une paire de boucles d'oreilles.

translation.en: Let's see if they fit!
Why now? After so many years?
translation.fr: Pourquoi maintenant ? Après tout ce temps ?

translation.en: Well, I guess I'm starting to realize that holding things in,
translation.fr: Je commence à comprendre que garder certaines choses

translation.en: it can really hurt somebody.
Yeah? Merry Christmas!
Maybe you have changed, Joseph.
I'm trying to prove it.
To you, to…
to everyone. [exhales]
-Joseph, that photo was-- -[Joseph] I know.
It's okay.
All right. Have fun tonight. Okay?
Hey, Joseph hasn't introduced us yet.
translation.fr: Salut. Joseph n'a pas fait les présentations.

translation.en: I'm Owen.
♪ I love you in a forever kind of way ♪
translation.fr: NOTRE FOYER EST DANS NOTRE CŒUR

translation.en: Joseph! Joseph, um…
-What? -I… I just got… [exhales]
-What? What? -It's time! It's time!
-For what? -The baby's coming! Hurry!
translation.fr: - De quoi ? - Le bébé arrive. Dépêche-toi !

translation.en: -I'll get my truck! -No time for that!
-I'm gonna be a dad. -Yes, you are gonna be a dad! [laughs]
translation.fr: - Je vais être papa. - Oui. Tu vas être papa !

translation.en: [Callie] Joseph!
